titles.title: To designate the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 369 Martin Luther King Jr. Drive in Jersey City, New Jersey, as the "Judge Shirley A. Tolentino Post Office Building".

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform.

committee.name: House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Federal Workforce, U.S. Postal Service, and Labor Policy .

committee.name: House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform

action.text: Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.

committee.name: House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform

calendar.text: Ordered to be Reported by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Ms. Buerkle moved to suspend the rules and pass the bill.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate on H.R. 2896.

vote.text: On motion to suspend the rules and pass the bill Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.
Received in the Senate and Read twice and referred to the Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs.

committee.name: House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform

action.text: Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs referred to Subcommittee on Federal Financial Management, Government Information, Federal Services, and International Security.

committee.name: House Oversight and Government Reform
committee.subcommittee: Federal Workforce, U.S. Postal Service, and Labor Policy

committee.name: Senate Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs
Senate Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs
committee.subcommittee: Federal Financial Management, Government Information, Federal Services, and International Security

bill.summary: 9/12/2011--Introduced. Designates the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 369 Martin Luther King Jr. Drive in Jersey City, New Jersey, as the "Judge Shirley A. Tolentino Post Office Building."
